description: Large knitted fleece with relaxed fit. G-1000® reinforcement on the shoulders, one breast pocket and two side pockets. Can be worn as a warm intermediate layer when out skiing or for relaxing in the cabin. G-1000® reinforcements on the shoulders offer extra durability and are practical when carrying a backpack. Zipper in the front, one breast pocket, two side pockets. Have details of animal origin.
name: Fjallraven Buck Fleece - Mens

specs.value: Chest pocket(s) with zipper, Hand pocket(s)
